Verses: 1 theyoppiluve, Yesuvaanavar Thaam Therindhukonda Apposthalarukkup Parisuththa Aaviyinaale Kattalaiyitta Pinbu,
2 avar Eduththukkollappatta Naalvaraikkum Seyyavum Ubadhesikkavum Thodangina Ellaavatraiyunkuriththu, Mudhalaam Pirabandhaththai Undupanninen.

3 avar Paadupattapinbu, Naarpadhu Naalalavum Apposthalarukkuth Dharisanamaagi, Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththukkuriyavaigalai Avargaludane Pesi, Anegam Thelivaana Thirushtaandhangalinaale Avargalukkuth Thammai Uyirodirukkiravaraagak Kaanbiththaar.
4 andriyum, Avar Avargaludane Koodivandhirukkumbodhu, Avargalai Nokki: Yovaan Jalaththinaale Gnaanasnaanankoduththaan; Neengal Sila Naalukkulle Parisuththa Aaviyinaale Gnaanasnaanam Peruveergal.
5 aagaiyaal Neengal Erusalemai Vittup Pogaamal Ennidaththil Kelvippatta Pidhaavin Vaakkuththaththam Niraiverak Kaaththirungal Endru Kattalaiyittaar.
6 appozhudhu Koodivandhirundhavargal Avarai Nokki: Aandavare, Ikkaalaththilaa Raajyaththai Isravelukkuth Thirumbak Koduppeer Endru Kettaargal.
7 adharku Avar: Pidhaavaanavar Thammudaiya Aadheenaththile Vaiththirukkira Kaalangalaiyum Velaigalaiyum Arigiradhu Ungalukku Aduththadhalla.
8 parisuththa Aavi Ungalidaththil Varumbodhu Neengal Belanadaindhu, Erusalemilum, Yoodheyaa Muzhuvadhilum, Samaariyaavilum, Boomiyin Kadaisibariyandhamum, Enakku Saatchigalaayiruppeergal Endraar.
9 ivaigalai Avar Sonnapinbu, Avargal Paarththukkondirukkaiyil, Uyara Eduththukkollappattaar; Avargal Kangalukku Maraivaaga Oru Megam Avarai Eduththukkondadhu.
10 avar Pogirabodhu Avargal Vaanaththai Annaandhu Paarththukkondirukkaiyil, Idho, Venmaiyaana Vasthiranthariththavargal Irandu Per Avargalaruge Nindru:

11 galileyaraagiya Manushare, Neengal En Vaanaththai Annaandhupaarththu Nirkireergal? Ungalidaththinindru Vaanaththukku Eduththukkollappatta Indha Yesuvaanavar Eppadi Ungal Kangalukku Munbaaga Vaanaththukku Ezhundharulipponaaro Appadiye Marupadiyum Varuvaar Endraargal.
12 appozhudhu Avargal Erusalemukkuch Sameebamaai Oru Oivunaal Pirayaana Dhooraththilirukkira Olivamalai Ennappatta Malaiyilirundhu Erusalemukkuth Thirumbipponaargal.

13 avargal Ange Vandhabodhu Melveettil Erinaargal; Adhil Pedhuruvum, Yaakkobum, Yovaanum, Andhireyaavum, Pilippuvum, Thomaavum, Barththolomeyum, Maththeyum, Albeyuvin Kumaaranaagiya Yaakkobum, Seloththe Ennappatta Seemonum, Yaakkobin Sagodharanaagiya Yoodhaavum Thangiyirundhaargal.
14 ange Ivargalellaarum, Sthireegalodum Yesuvin Thaayaagiya Mariyaalodum, Avarudaiya Sagodhararodunkooda Orumanappattu, Jebaththilum Vendudhalilum Thariththirundhaargal.
15 annaatkalile, Seeshargalil Erakkuraiya Nootrirubadhuper Koodiyirundhabodhu, Avargal Naduvile Pedhuru Ezhundhu Nindru:
16 sagodharare, Yesuvaip Pidiththavargalukku Vazhikaattina Yoodhaasaikkuriththup Parisuththa Aavi Thaaveedhin Vaakkinaal Mun Sonna Vedhavaakkiyam Niraiveravendiyadhaayirundhadhu.
17 avan Engalil Oruvanaaga Ennappattu, Indha Oozhiyaththil Pangupetravanaayirundhaan.
18 aneedhaththin Kooliyinaal Avan Orunilaththaich Sambaadhiththu, Thalaikeezhaaga Vizhundhaan; Avan Vayiru Vediththu, Kudalgalellaam Sarindhupoyitru.
19 idhu Erusalemilulla Kudigal Yaavarukkum Therindhirukkiradhu; Adhinaale Andha Nilam Avargaludaiya Baashaiyile Raththanilam Endru Arththankollum Akkeldhamaa Ennappattirukkiradhu.
20 sangeedha Busdhagaththile: Avanudaiya Vaasasthalam Paazhaakakkadavadhu, Oruvanum Adhil Vaasampannaadhiruppaanaaga Endrum; Avanudaiya Kankaanippai Veroruvan Perakkadavan Endrum Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
21 aadhalaal, Yovaan Gnaanasnaanankoduththa Naalmudharkondu, Karththaraagiya Yesuvaanavar Nammidaththilirundhu Uyara Eduththukkollappatta Naalvaraikkum,

22 avar Nammidaththil Sanjariththirundha Kaalangalilellaam Engaludanekooda Irundha Manushargalil Oruvan Avar Uyirodezhundhadhaikkuriththu, Engaludanekoodach Saatchiyaaga Erpaduththappadavendum Endraan.
23 appozhudhu Avargal Yusthu Ennum Marunaamamulla Barsabaa Ennappatta Yoseppum, Maththiyaavum Aagiya Ivviranduperaiyum Niruththi:

24 ellaarudaiya Irudhayangalaiyum Arindhirukkira Karththaave, Yoodhaas Enbavan Thanakkuriya Idaththukkup Pogumpadi Izhandhupona Indha Oozhiyaththilum Indha Apposthalappattaththilum Panguperuvadharkaaga,
25 ivvirandu Peril Dhevareer Therindhukondavanai Engalukkuk Kaanbiththarulum Endru Jebampanni;
26 pinbu, Avargalaik Kuriththuch Seettuppottaargal; Seettu Maththiyaavin Perukku Vizhundhadhu; Appozhudhu Avan Padhinoru Apposthalarudane Serththukkollappattaan.
